hero.tagline: I build reliable ML systems and do research.

about.title: About Me
about.body_html: I’m a researcher and ML engineer focused on audio and signal processing, with an emphasis on robust datasets and practical learning setups. I care about clarity, strong baselines, and reproducibility.

goals.title: Goals
items: Pursue a master's program in Japan (statistics/applied math).
Publish robust baselines and datasets for onset detection.
Contribute to open-source audio ML tooling.
